**André Calero Valdez** is Professor for human-computer interaction and usable safety engineering at the [University of Lübeck](http://www.imis.uni-luebeck.de). He uses structural equation modeling to identify antecedents of user behavior in safety critical applications and ehealth applications.

## Education

RWTH Aachen University \| Aachen, Germany, PhD in Psychology \| Sept 2008 - Dez 2013

RWTH Aachen University \| Aachen, Germany, Diplom (Masters) in Computer Science \| Oct 2001 - Sept 2008
